title: Modern geometric/angular monospace
content:
Whole project can be seen here: [http://gourdin-mueller.de/Signage------\_site.index..html\_dir.\_nav.18\_lik...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317192742/http:/gourdin-mueller.de/Signage------_site.index..html_dir._nav.18_likecms.html?prj=51 "http://gourdin-mueller.de/Signage------\_site.index..html\_dir.\_nav.18\_likecms.html?prj=51")

Font: 

 Deck by Optimo.ch

author: beton

comments.content:
Appears to be Deck by Optimo, but I can’t find it on their site:  
 [http://www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Optimo%20%2F...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317192742/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Optimo%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Deck%20-%20Regular&fstyle=&fsize=60&fid=4057e65e16a4eee0aa2c0ff5c437a93e&wrap=2&text=Ausstellungen%201 "http://www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Optimo%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Deck%20-%20Regular&fstyle=&fsize=60&fid=4057e65e16a4eee0aa2c0ff5c437a93e&wrap=2&text=Ausstellungen%201")

Here’s info about the designer:  
 [http://graphdes.com/2012/10/26/same-blog-new-url/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317192742/http:/graphdes.com/2012/10/26/same-blog-new-url/ "http://graphdes.com/2012/10/26/same-blog-new-url/")

That was quick, thank you.

Also, any suggestions based on this style/feel/theme are more than welcomed.
